name: Cargo Fulfillment
description:
Hey there boss, welcome to fulfillment center. This place needs your help, there are tons of packages to deliver.

Start your journey by delivering packages to your customers by yourself, one by one, and progress your business to become the biggest cargo company in the world!

You have lots of options to grow your business : You will start by deliveries only, then you will be able to accept shipment orders and collect packages from returning customers and dispatch your first delivery!

You will not stop there, your success will be known in the world and all kind of VIP customers will use your services, they will come to your shipment center via drive through with shiny cars and receive their packages, and they will pay BIG!

Don't forget to hire some helpers and carefully manage your fulfillment center to handle all kinds of delivery needs, your business will grow endlessly, you will become a tycoon!

This is only the beginning.

Key features:
- Easy to learn, hard to master mechanics,
- Beautiful graphics and environments,
- Fun and enticing animations,
- Tons of different unlocks, endless upgrades.
